Method Detail

isDragAndDropSource

public boolean isDragAndDropSource()
Gets whether this is a object that can be 'picked up' to start a drag and drop operation.

Returns:
true if this is a possible source of drag-and-drop operations

isDragAndDropTarget

public boolean isDragAndDropTarget()
Gets whether this is a object that can be 'dropped on' to finish a drag and drop operation.

Returns:
true if this is a possible target of drag-and-drop operations

doImport

public void doImport(MiDataTransferOperation transfer)
Import the data as specified by the given data transfer operation instance.

Parameters:
transfer - contains data and format information.

doExport

public java.lang.Object doExport(java.lang.String format)
Export the data in the format as specified.

Parameters:
format - the name of the format

supportsImportOfSpecificInstance

public boolean supportsImportOfSpecificInstance(MiDataTransferOperation transfer)
Gets whether this class is able to import the actual data as specified by the given transfer operation. This is useful when the class accepts only certain kinds of data in a particular format.

Parameters:
transfer - contains data and format information.

getSupportedImportFormats

public java.lang.String[] getSupportedImportFormats()
Gets a list of the names of data formats that can be imported.

Returns:
array of names of data formats

getSupportedExportFormats

public java.lang.String[] getSupportedExportFormats()
Gets a list of the names of data formats that can be exported.

Returns:
array of names of data formats
